snippet: If you have been chosen as a winner in a Learning Network contest at any time since Sept. 2013, you can now follow these directions to have your last name added to the announcement.
abstract: If you have been chosen as a winner in a Learning Network contest at any time since Sept. 2013, you can now follow these directions to have your last name added to the announcement.

headline.main: How to Get Your Last Name Posted After You Win a Learning Network Student Contest
